description: I am a fullstack developer with a passion for creating modern and responsive web and mobile applications.
skills_description: I have experience with the following technologies:
services_1_description: I create websites based on your ready-made design. Whether it's a landing page or a business card website, I will make it look great and work smoothly on any device.
services_2_description: I develop mobile applications for iOS and Android using React Native. I can create a mobile app from scratch or add new features to an existing one.
services_3_description: I create RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express. I can build a custom API for your web or mobile application or integrate with third-party APIs.
project_in_mind: do you have a project in mind?
